body:
@-Fin-
They're both cheating. She asks hims to impregnate her if she ends up marrying because she wants to have the baby of the man he loves. Dude is quite confused about it, but can't say no to a free all-you-can-nut. So he does, and in the end she gets pregnant. It ends with them talking about how they can fuck while she's pregnant.
Yeah, not an award winning story. But you can't beat the dick.
So. What's the story for this manga? The woman is the wife of someone, and she cheats with her co worker? Is that it?
